message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you for $180. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $150 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While I value this product highly, I'm willing to come down to $165. This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $145 for the product.
Bob, it seems like we're getting closer.  How about we split the difference and settle on $155? This is a very fair price for this product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. Based on my research and considering the value of the product, I would like to counter with an offer of $148 for the product.
